description: Try our easy to follow Superfoods Breaky Bowl With Banana, Oats And Chia recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Superfoods Breaky Bowl With Banana, Oats And Chia Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium over-ripe banana, frozen, peeled, chopped coarsely (plus extra fresh bananas for topping)
1 cup fresh strawberries, hulled (plus extra for topping)
1 cup frozen raspberries (plus extra fresh raspberries for topping)

recipeInstructions.text: Place 70g oats, banana, strawberries, raspberries, almond milk and honey into a blender; process for 1 minute or until smooth.
Serve immediately topped with extra fresh banana, strawberries and raspberries, chia seeds and the remaining oats.
For an added crunch, top with cranberry and hazelnut clusters.
